pages.text: During my trip I found some newspapers with some useful information on it to help me understand what had happened during the decades of hibernation...

$(l)$(4) Integrated Control Bureau Announces Cosmic Colonization Plan/$$(br)  $(l)Losted Hope News /$At about 14:00 today, after three years of discussions, the headquarters of the Integrated Control Bureau officially approved the launch of the space migration plan. $(br) Due to the deteriorating global environment, the future of human survival is worrying. After a rigorous analysis by several scientific experts, it was proposed that the earth
was no longer suitable for human survival, and it was recommended to immediately migrate to Kepler-22b.$(br)$(3)[The later plot felt too awkward so I deleted it for the time being...]
